name: CASHMERE (youthindecline)
description:
Sunfly or Die. 🎤

A small game created in Fall 2019, to force myself to learn the basics of Ink logic and syntax. Some random generation, 4 different endings, tracked variables, loops, silliness.

 Will be fixing game bugs but resisting the urge to rewrite the narrative and dialogue.  "Progress not Perfection."
